name: Fly Fishin'
description:
Maggy The Frog and Grandma Frog are taking a relaxing fishing trip.

Granny has brought along a shopping list for today, and she hopes you'll be able to catch all of the fish on it before sundown!

Objective

Your goal is to catch all of the fish on the day's shopping list, displayed at the top left of the screen.

Accomplish this by snatching bugs out of the sky with your tongue and putting them in your bait bag.  You can then use bugs from your bait bag to lure fish.  Use different kinds of bugs to catch different kinds of fish.  The fish have bait preference and won't bite a bait they don't like!
It's up to you to figure out which bugs work on which fish!  Sometimes, Granny will provide you with helpful hints, so keep an eye out!  Her wisdom is valuable!

The day is short!  Be sure you catch all of the day's fish before the sun sets.

Have fun!

Controls  - Above water

Left Click above the water to snatch a bug and add it to your Bait Bag.
You can have 3 bugs in your bait bag at a time.  
You can have duplicate bugs in your bait bag. 
A bug will always occupy an empty spot in the bag.
If the bag is full, any new bug you catch will replace the currently selected bug.

<E> cycles through bait in the Bait Bag.  The selected bug is highlighted.

<Q> applies the highlighted bait to your hook.
Press <Q>  again to return the bait to the Bait Bag.

Controls - Below water

Left Click below the water to cast your line and try to hook a fish!

<R>  to reel in your line.
Try to reel in when a fish is very close to the hook, and you will hook the fish!
If you wait too long, the fish will get nervous and flee.

A submission for MiniJam 106
